resources.string: Word Search Custom Word Bank Editor
Your custom word bank has no words.\nClick menu then click new word
No words could be found for this grid, please choose a different grid size or word bank.
There are no words available in your custom word bank, please go to the custom word bank editor and add some words or choose a different word bank.
There are no words currently in your custom word bank, please click menu then add word.
Words must be at least 4 letters
In WordSearch, your goal is to find all of the words in the word list. There are two ways that you can find words:
Drag and Tap both use the touchscreen. Drag is selected by default, but you can switch between Drag and Tap by going to the menu and picking \"Input Type.\"
Using your finger, touch the first letter of a word.
Without lifting your finger, drag across the screen to the last letter of the word.

As you drag your finger around, the letters you are currently highlighting will turn yellow. You can see the letter your finger is currently on in the top left corner of the screen (where the \"<\" arrow usually is).

When you have highlighted the entire word (and no more than the entire word), lift your finger off the screen. The word will then change to a different color in the grid and will be removed from the word list.
Roll the trackball around to find the first letter of a word. The letter you are currently on is green.
When you are on the first letter of a word, click the trackball to start highlighting the word.
Roll the trackball to the last letter of the word and click the trackball again to find the word. The word will change to a different color in the grid and will be removed from the word list.
Using your finger, tap the first letter of the word and lift your finger.
Using your finger, tap the last letter of the word. The entire word will be highlighted and the word will be removed from the word list.

The letter is not selected until you lift your finger. If, when you try to tap, you pick the wrong letter, don\'t lift up your finger--just drag your finger around the screen until you find the correct letter (use the letter box in the top-left corner if you need help) and lift your finger when you are over the correct letter.
You can also highlight a word starting from the last letter and ending on the first.
Use the \"<\" and \">\" arrows to browse through the words in the current word list. To change word lists, go to the menu and click on \"Word Bank.\"
You can find any word in the word list, not just the one that is currently displayed

If you are having trouble using tap or drag to highlight a word, go to the menu, click on \"Size\" and choose a grid with fewer letters (i.e. 7x7). Because there are fewer letters, the letters are more spaced out and easier to pick with your finger.
If you are using the trackball, remember to click the trackball to begin and end finding a word. if you do not click the trackball, the game does not know that you are trying to find a word.
Because the grid is randomly generated, you may see some words that are not part of the word list; you cannot highlight and \"find\" these words
If you are using drag to highlight words, be careful not to drag your finger off of the touch screen. Going off the touch screen is the same as lifting your finger.

When selecting a word using drag, the game will only highlight in yellow letters in a straight line going directly above, below, left, right, or diagonally between where you started highlighting and where your finger currently is. If your finger is not in a direct line from the start letter, the highlight will not follow your finger until your finger returns to a direct line from the start letter. The game will find the word that is highlighted, regardless of where your finger is when you lift it.
Would you like to start a new game?
"We are very sorry but Open WordSearch has crashed unexpectedly.\n\nPlease help us make our application better by sending us stack trace"

The wordsearch game has been reset to it's original code base which is Open Wordsearch version 2.3.4.
 You can change the grid size, word bank, and how you highlight words by pushing the "menu" button and selecting "preferences." Or, you can pick how you highlight words now.
- "Tap" means you tap on the first and last letters but nothing in between.
- "Drag" means you highlight the entire word without lifting your finger.
Overwrite, Warning: this will remove existing custom words
Please install OI File Manager to pick a custom file location, else use the default location
We, the developers, are glad you enjoy this game. Please consider donating to support this open source development.
Please consider donating to support this project\'s development. There is a donate app in the market, or you can use Paypal or Google Checkout through our website.
